cause.description:
Free Palestine from illegal Israeli occupation. Over many years Israel has been invading Palestine, village by village, leaving thousands dead, in jured or homeless. Britain should take out their troops from operations which are non beneficial for anyone ie Iraq, where they've made more of a mess than it already was, and deploy them in stoppin Israeli forces who are clearly breachin international law and invading a country. If Israel were a muslim nation with oil, British troops would've been there lettin all hell loose in the blink of an eye, but as it's the muslim nation under opression, the British government just want to 'talk' to try n settle matters and not use their troops.
1. Stop innocent killings in Palestine
2. Stop Israeli forces forcing their way into Palestinian villages and illegally taking over
3. Get British troops to
cause.name: Palestine
